statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Mexican Shade Grown coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.20} per pound with some Kona coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${11.60} per pound to create \displaystyle{10} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${11.32} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
pounds of Mexican Shade Grown coffee.
